title: Peyton Manning partners with Georgia Tech for Demaryius Thomas scholarship - ESPN
content:
1. Peyton Manning partners with Georgia Tech for Demaryius Thomas scholarship  ESPN
  2. Thomas Scholarship Established by Mannings' PeyBack Foundation – Football — Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets  Georgia Tech
  3. Peyton Manning, wife team with Georgia Tech to offer scholarship fund in honor of Demaryius Thomas  CBS Sports
  4. Peyton and Ashley Manning's PeyBack Foundation establishes Demaryius Thomas scholarship at Georgia Tech  NFL.com
  5. Peyton Manning Honors Demaryius Thomas With Georgia Tech Scholarship  Sports Illustrated
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Demaryius Thomas Scholarship Endowment, created through Peyton Manning's PeyBack Foundation, will award academic scholarships to incoming Georgia Tech freshmen from the former wide receiver's hometown or nearby communities.
